price: N’abamalayika bazaba bakizengurutse (ikirere) impande zacyo. Kandi kuri uwo munsi abamalayika umunani biyongera kuri abo bazaba bateruye Ar’shi[1] ya Nyagasani wawe.
arabic: وَٱلۡمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرۡجَآئِهَاۚ وَيَحۡمِلُ عَرۡشَ رَبِّكَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ ثَمَٰنِيَةٞ
footnotes: [1] Reba ibisobanuro by’iri jambo muri Surat ul A’araf, Aya ya 54

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wal-malaku ʿalā arjāihā wayaḥmilu ʿarsha rabbika fawqahum yawma-idhin thamāniyatun
